tool_description: Monitors and assesses potential side effects and adverse drug reactions based on patient medications and reported symptoms.

severity_threshold.description: Minimum severity to report: mild, moderate, or severe

include_drug_interactions.description: Whether to consider interaction-related side effects

error_messages: Patient not found: The provided patient_id is not valid.
Invalid medication list: One or more medications are not recognized.
Too many medications: Maximum 30 medications can be monitored simultaneously.
Invalid monitoring duration: Duration must be between 1-365 days.
Invalid severity threshold: Use mild, moderate, or severe.
Too many symptoms: Maximum 20 symptoms can be processed at once.
usage: Provide patient_id and current_medications. Optionally include reported_symptoms and adjust monitoring parameters for comprehensive side effect analysis.

symptom_drug_correlations.description: Correlations between reported symptoms and medications

monitoring_recommendations.description: Suggested monitoring activities or laboratory tests

medication_adjustments.description: Recommended medication changes to reduce side effects
